name: Graviton crystal, least
description: Graviton crystals accelerate the impact of a weapon, dealing extra damage and potentially knocking down targets.

name: Photon crystal, least
description: Photon crystals add compressed photonic energy to a weapon strike, adding fire damage and the potential to burn the target.

name: W-boson crystal, least
description: W-boson crystals amplify the sheer amount of damage a weapon deals.

name: Gluon crystal, least
description: Gluon crystals create an entropic field along the weapon that creates traumatic wounds.
